com.leantegra.powermote.sdk.monitoring.info

Class Region.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leantegra.powermote.sdk.monitoring.info.Region.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Region

    public static final class Region.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Region Builder.

    When constructing a region, all fields may be set to null, except regionID. Null field will match any value.

    Note: regionID field value used to identify region in monitoring or ranging. It's not possible to add region with already existing regionID. To stop monitoring or ranging, just pass a Region object that has the same regionID value.

    See Also:
    Region
